newsitem.title: INDIA: India 96/97 cotton crop seen at 16.78 mln bales.
newsitem.headline: India 96/97 cotton crop seen at 16.78 mln bales.

text.p: India's 1996/97 (October/September) cotton crop is estimated at 16.78 million 170 kg bales, compared with 16.27 million bales in the previous crop year, the East India Cotton Association said on Saturday.
Delegates to a national conference of cotton trade organisations called by the association on Saturday said fair weather had contributed to the rise in the current year's crop.
The conference estimated the 1996/97 crop in Maharashtra and Gujarat in western India at 3.25 million bales and 3.35 million respectively after the previous year's 2.86 million and 3.22 million.
The northern states of Punjab and Haryana and the central state of Madhya Pradesh also reported a marginal rise in their cotton crop, it added.
